page.title: 16CLUBS
page.content: Although inevitably in a largely rural community the number of clubs is limited.Those that exist are well supported and in addition a number of people supported outside organisations such as the N.S.P.C.C. and the R.S.P.B. {JUNIORS.}Some children were members of the scout movement or the cubs and brownies all based in Lazenby .{SOCIAL.}The focal point of the village of Lazenby is the Social club, a club which offers the usual facilities of a working mens club :_ snooker,darts,dominoes,cards and the ancient game of quoits,which has had a recent upsurge in popularity.{SPORTS.} Wilton golf club is an eighteen hole course.It has excellent social facilities and is very popular with I.C.I. employees who receive cheap membership as I.C.I. own the club.
